pkgmetadata.longdescription: ## To Install Main Package```pip install censius -U```## To Install Dev Package``` pip install --trusted-host pypi-dev.eastus.azurecontainer.io:8080 \ --index-url http://pypi-dev.eastus.azurecontainer.io:8080/simple/ censius -U```## API Reference to execute operationhttps://documentation.censius.ai/api-reference
